content:
237 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (i) IBADAN requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at 
one (1) sitting or six (6) ‘O’ level credit passes at 
two (2) sitting including English Language and 
two (2) Arts subjects one (1) of which must be 
Yoruba  
(ii) ILORIN accepts candidates who do not offer 
Yoruba Language/Literature but meet the UTME 
entry requirement.  
(iii) OAU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to 
include English Language and any Arts subject.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) IBADAN - requires Yoruba and two (2) other 
subjects in Arts or Social Sciences.  
(ii) OAU requires three (3) subjects from Arts and/or 
Social Sciences.  
(iii) OOU - Yoruba and two (2) Arts subjects.  
  
ANTHROPOLOGY  
 IBADAN        
  
Any two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes in Arts subjects.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit passes 
to include one of 
Government/History,  
Religious Studies,  
Geography and Economics.  
  
Any three (3) of  
History, CRS/IS,  
Geography,  
Economics,  
Literature-
inEnglish and 
French.  
DIRECT ENTRY  
IBADAN accepts 'A' level passes in Geography, 
Economics, Government and Sociology.  
  
UTME  
IBADAN requires 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language and any other three (3) Arts subjects.  
FULFULDE  
MAIDUGURI  
BASU  
Two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes in Arts and 
Social Science 
subjects.  
Five (5) SSC credit passes in 
Arts/Social Science 
subjects.  
Any three (3) Arts 
subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
MAIDUGURI accepts Certificate in Fulfulde and 
NCE in Fulfulde.  
EFIK-IBIBIO  
UYO      
Two (2) ‘A’ level passes 
or equivalent in Arts or 
Social Science subjects.  
Five (5) SSC credit passes or 
equivalent including English 
Language and Efik.  
  
Literature-in-  
English and two (2) 
other Arts or Social 
Science subjects.  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i)  UYO accepts NCE merit in Efik/Ibibio.
